content: When Trump left office, did the clown car finally exit the White House? Nah, were stuck in a tragic comedy sequel where the punchline is always the suffering of the many for the benefit of the few. The only thing disappearing faster than his hairline is our hope for a better tomorrow. Reviving the American Dream? More like turning it into a horror flick for the middle class. Making America a safe place again? Sure, as safe as a clown juggling dynamite. Bringing back American greatness? All you brought back was a masterclass in corruption and incompetence. #DumpTrump
author: Bitter_Comedian
